Defines class ReadTemplate with attribute(s) and method(s). Creates an API for reading a template files.

class gen_avr8.pro.read_template.ReadTemplate(verbose: bool = False)[source]¶

Bases: FileCheck

Defines class ReadTemplate with attribute(s) and method(s). Creates an API for reading a template files.

It defines:

attributes:
_GEN_VERBOSE - Console text indicator for process-phase.
_FORMAT - File format for template.
methods:
__init__ - Initials ReadTemplate constructor.
read - Reads template file.
_FORMAT: str = 'template'¶
_GEN_VERBOSE: str = 'GEN_AVR8::PRO::READ_TEMPLATE'¶
read(template_file: str | None, verbose: bool = False) → str | None[source]¶

Reads template file.

Parameters:

  • template_file (<Optional[str]>) – Template file path | None

  • verbose (<bool>) – Enable/Disable verbose option

Returns:

Template content for module | None

Return type:

<Optional[str]>

Exceptions:

ATSTypeError
